title: Olympic Officials Ban Ukrainian’s Helmet Honoring War Dead
summary_full: Vladyslav Heraskevych said he would risk disqualification to wear a helmet that the International Olympic Committee said defied a ban on political speech.
summary_public: Vladyslav Heraskevych said he would risk disqualification to wear a helmet that the International Olympic Committee said defied a ban on political speech.

UA.label: neutral
UA.evidence: Olympic Officials Ban Ukrainian’s Helmet Honoring War Dead
